text:
I'm so happy with this order! I love Starbucks VIA but I can only have decaf now. I hated how the stores usually only carry the small packages. This 50 pack is great and it has a nice little dispenser. It's on my counter now and I'll probably go through it quickly!

The expiration date on my package is for 1 year from now. So, I'm very happy about that!
